text: hey everyone it's Anna and this is the
English fluency journey where I give
tips and advice for English learners and
in this video I'm going to talk about
the difference between to have in mind
and on mind have you ever thought of
that because there is a little
difference so to have in mind means to
think about something or someone to have
some thoughts some ideas that don't
bother you to know what you want
and to remember something for example do
you have any colleges in mind oh I have
that gorgeous red dress in mind for
tonight or Pizza sounds okay but I had
Italian food in mind or does everybody
have the procedure firmly in mind to
have on mind means to think of something
or someone a lot even worry or maybe
even to be obsessed with something and
perhaps you need to talk to someone a
friend or a specialist for example you
don't like to get it off your chest so
if someone looks concerned or anxious
you can ask them what's on your mind
like what's bothering you if you're
worried about something you can say oh I
have a lot on my mind right now you are
always on my mind means that you always
think about this person maybe even too
much or to the point of worrying whereas
you're always in my mind means that you
always remember this person and when you
ask a question what's on your mind a
person you're asking edge will consider
it as a suggestion to share their
feelings or as a question what's in your
mind might sound a little bit weird
because it's not a set phrase and people
don't ask usually this question and they
would think what do you mean so it
sounds weird so you can totally ask
what's on your mind or what do you have
in mind in context you know like do you
have any suggestions well it was a teeny
tiny piece of information to make this
difference clear and not to overwhelm
you much if you're curious and want to
know more about some idiots and
expressions please feel free to ask
speak your mind if you liked this video
and found it useful give it a like
subscribe and turn on the notifications
to get more beneficial information and
stay positive and motivated and see you
soon
